content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #248

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 42

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: FHIR Resource Access
Type: A-T :pencil2:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

While CDS Hooks shares the underlying technical framework and standards as SMART on FHIR, the CDS Hooks workflow must accommodate the automated, low-latency delivery of an access token to the CDS service.

Proposed Wording:

While CDS Hooks shares the underlying technical framework and standards as SMART on FHIR, the CDS Hooks workflow accommodatesthe automated, low-latency delivery of an access token to the CDS service.

Comment:
Typo?

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will fix as suggested

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #248

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment:
We will fix as suggested

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

Address by changes in other comments, unable to find exact commit.
